title: Street in Paris

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of oil on canvas.

publication_history:
Boston Art Club, Birch Bartlett Collection of Modern French Paintings, exh. cat. (Boston: Art Club, 1925).

Minneapolis Institute of Arts, Exhibition of Modern French Paintings from the Birch-Bartlett Collection, Lent by Frederick C. Bartlett of Chicago, exh. cat. (Minneapolis: Institute of Arts, 1925).

Art Institute of Chicago, Birch-Bartlett Memorial Handbook, 1926, pp. 40, 41.

Einstein, Carl, Die Kunst des 20 Jahrhunderts, (1926), pp. 253.

Art Institute of Chicago, Birch-Bartlett Memorial Handbook, 1929, pp. 46, 47.

Art Institute of Chicago, A Century of Progress: Exhibition of Paintings and Sculpture Lent from American Collections, exh. cat. (Chicago: Art Institute, 1933), p. 80.

Art Institute of Chicago, A Century of Progress: Exhibition of Paintings and Sculpture Lent from American Collections, exh. cat. (Chicago: Art Institute, 1934), p. 53.

Art Institute of Chicago, Birch-Bartlett, 1946, pp. 50-51 (ill.).

Art Institute of Chicago, Paintings in the Art Institute of Chicago: A Catalogue of the Picture Collection (Chicago: Art Institute, 1961), p. 458, as Street in Paris, 1914. 

Art Institute of Chicago, “The Helen Birch Bartlett Memorial Collection,” Art Institute of Chicago Museum Studies 12, 2 (1986), pp. 223 (no. 24), 226 (ill.), as Street in Paris, 1914.
exhibition_history:
Minneapolis, Institute of Arts, Exhibition of Modern French Paintings from the Birch-Bartlett Collection Lent by Frederick C. Bartlett of Chicago, April 1925.

Boston, Art Club, Birch Bartlett Collection of Modern French Paintings, December 9–26, 1925.

New York, Museum of Modern Art, Painting in Paris from American Collections, January 19–February 16, 1930, p. (no. 92).

Providence, Rhode Island School of Design, Modern French Art, March 1930, p. (cat. 40).

Art Institute of Chicago, A Century of Progress: Exhibition of Paintings and Sculpture Lent from American Collections, June 1–November 1, 1933, p. (cat. 714).

Art Institute of Chicago, A Century of Progress: Exhibition of Paintings and Sculpture Lent from American Collections, June 1–November 1, 1934, p. (cat. 366).
provenance_text: Galerie Percier; sold to Frederic C. and Helen Birch Bartlett, 1924; given to the Art Institute of Chicago, 1926.
